item.description: Mortgage Formula Derivation Geometry Series $$ S_n = 1 + a + a^2 + \cdots + a^{n-1} + a^n$$ $$ S_n a = a + a^2 + a^3 + \cdots + a^n+ a^{n+1} $$ $$ S_n (a-1) = a^{n+1}-1 $$ $$ S_n = \frac{1-a^{n+1}}{(1-a)} $$ Derivation $n$ number of months $m$ monthly payment $a$ annualized interest rate $r=a/12$ monthly interest rate (anuualized interest rate divided by 12 months) $p$ principal
